title: Upcoming 2020 Legion Gaming Notebooks & More!
description: Legion's latest gaming notebooks may be the Y740 & Y540 but during a recent trip to Lenovo's head office, we got to see some of the changes coming to their Y750 & Y550 in 2020.  That includes updates to their design, connectors and Intel processors.  Its nice to see our input being put to good use so join us on this vlog through a week at Lenovo.    Shop the Latest Legion Notebooks:       Buy items in this video from Amazon at the links below:    Corsair Harpoon:     Subscribe    Lenovo paid for our flight and accommodations in North Carolina . This video is sponsored by Lenovo and Corsair. As per Hardware Canucks guidelines, no video direction was received from manufacturers.   As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.  Gear list (Available on Amazon):  Main Camera -  Main Lens -  Main Camera Mic -  Second Camera -  $700 Camera (Panasonic G7) -  Sigma 18-35mm F1.8 -  Cinevate DUZI Slider -  AKG C314 -  AKG C 568 B -  Zoom H5 -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------  #legiony750 lenovolegiony740 #hardwarecanucks
